code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[notes,setNotes]=useState([]);const[inputTitle,setInputTitle]=useState('');const[inputContent,setInputContent]=useState('');const addNote=()=>{if(inputTitle.trim()===''||inputContent.trim()==='')return;const newNote={id:Date.now(),title:inputTitle,content:inputContent};setNotes([...notes,newNote]);setInputTitle('');setInputContent('');};const deleteNote=id=>{const updatedNotes=notes.filter(note=>note.id!==id);setNotes(updatedNotes);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Bloco de Notas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:inputTitle,onChange:e=>setInputTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"T\xEDtulo",style:{width:'300px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:inputContent,onChange:e=>setInputContent(e.target.value),placeholder:"Nota",style:{width:'300px',height:'50px',margin:'0 auto'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addNote,children:"Salvar"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notes-container",children:notes.map(note=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"note",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:note.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteNote(note.id),children:"Delete"})]},note.id))})]});};export default App;
